title: Secrétaire
description: Secrétaire; Attributed to Jean-Henri Riesener (French, 1734 - 1806, master 1768, fournisseur du garde-meuble royal 1774 - 1784); Paris, France; about 1785; Oak veneered with panels of Japanese lacquer and ebony; interior fittings of mahogany; gilt bronze mounts; black marble top; 154.9 × 113 × 46.7 cm (61 × 44 1/2 × 18 3/8 in.); 71.DA.104; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
